properties.entry: SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS = 'N'
SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO FAQ (BOARD_NO, POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT) VALUES (5, SEQ_FAQNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?)
UPDATE FAQ SET POST_TITLE = ?, POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE FAQ SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
